string-array.name: questionsTrue
string-array.item: The largest country in the world is Russia
There are dolphins in the Amazon river
The capital city of Australia is Canberra.
Mount Snowdon is the highest mountain in Wales.
Kabul is the capital of Afghanistan.

string-array.name: questionsFalse
string-array.item: The River Thames flows through Cambridge.
More people live in Venice than Bari, Italy.
Male is the capital of Malaysia.
Tributaries are the largest type of river.
Iceland is the country with the most active volcanoes in the world
